import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "./CartDetails.css"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; const CartDetails = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { items, totalQuantity } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const addToCartHandler = () => { dispatch(cartActions.addItemToCart(fooditem)); toast.success("Item Added"); }; const removeToItemHandler = () => { dispatch(cartActions.removeItemFromCart(fooditem._id)); toast.success("Item Removed"); }; return ( <> {items.length === 0 &&

You Cart is empty

} {items.length > 0 && (

Your Cart : {items.length} {items.length === 1 ? "Item" : "Items"}

{items.map((item) => ( <>

{item.name}

 {item.price}

- +
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal : {totalQuantity}(units)

Total : {items .reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.quantity * item.price, 0 ) .toFixed(2)}

)} ); }; export default CartDetails;
